attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of police forces that don't work along side the media apart from the brttish transport police as the BTP work very well with the media but other police forces try to stop photographers from doing there jobs and this petiton is to get the prime minister to design a law that will protect photographers from police officers who think there know the law as they try make it look like we have done something wrong
